build.name: boot
build.build_command: python -u boot_images/QcomPkg/buildex.py -t 8250,QcomToolsPkg,QcomCatePkg,QcomTestPkg,QuestPkg,QuestBinPkg -v LAA,LAB,LAC,LAD,LAE,LAF && rm -f boot_images/Conf/* && cd boot_images/BaseTools && rm -f ./workspace.txt && make clean && cd ../.. && python boot_images/packit.py -c LAA,LAB,LAC,LAD,LAE,LAF -t 8250,QcomToolsPkg,QcomTestPkg && mkdir SP_compiletest && cp -r ./SRC_8250_LAA_LAB/* ./SP_compiletest/ && echo "./SP_compiletest/boot_images/Build/SM8250LAA/Loader/RELEASE_CLANG40LINUX/AARCH64/xbl.elf" >> BuildProducts.txt && echo "./SP_compiletest/boot_images/Build/SM8250LAB/Loader/RELEASE_CLANG40LINUX/AARCH64/xbl.elf" >> BuildProducts.txt && echo "./SP_compiletest/boot_images/QcomPkg/QcomToolsPkg/Bin/QcomTools/RELEASE/tools.fv" >> BuildProducts.txt && echo "./SP_compiletest/boot_images/QcomPkg/QcomTestPkg/Bin/QcomTest/RELEASE/tests.fv" >> BuildProducts.txt && python -u SP_compiletest/boot_images/QcomPkg/buildex.py -t 8250,QcomToolsPkg,QcomTestPkg -v LAA,LAB,LAC,LAD,LAE,LAF -r RELEASE
